CustomField.inlineHelpText: Realized Strategies are measured through related Closed-Won Opportunities. The update of this field is done in the future when you are ready to close out this strategy.
CustomField.label: Did you realize your Strategy?

value.fullName: Yes, I achieved this Strategy in the committed timeframe
value.label: Yes, I achieved this Strategy in the committed timeframe

value.fullName: No, I did not achieve this Strategy
value.label: No, I did not achieve this Strategy

value.fullName: Still in Progress, I will achieve it in 2nd Half
value.label: Still in Progress, I will achieve it in 2nd Half

value.fullName: Still in Progress, Strategy to be recreated in next year's Account Plan
value.label: Still in Progress, Strategy to be recreated in next year's Account Plan
